Articles.Content: Does anyone no where the mouse cursor is in the ksp directory.
Nope. Do you want to edit it or something?
i wanna try making it my cursor on windows
Interesting, interesting... Maybe this will give people a chance to change the actual KSP cursor like they've been wanting to do for some odd reason.
Could probably just take a screenshot with an external utility and extract the cursor image from there.

My opinion of the mouse: kill it before it lays eggs.

Here is the cure:

[Cursor Deleter MOD](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/120550-CursorDeleter)
